title.text: SemEval-2007 Task 5: Multilingual Chinese-English Lexical Sample

abstractContent.text: The Multilingual Chinese-English lexical sample task at SemEval-2007 provides a framework to evaluate Chinese word sense disambiguation and to promote research.
This paper reports on the task preparation and the results of six participants.

introductionContent.text: The Multilingual Chinese-English lexical sample task is designed following the leading ideas of the Senseval-3 Multilingual English-Hindi lexical sample task ( ).

entities.text: Senseval-3 Multilingual English-Hindi lexical sample task

introductionContent.text: The "sense tags" for the ambiguous Chinese target words are given in the form of their English translations.
The data preparation is introduced in the second section.
And then the participating systems are briefly described and their scores are listed.
In the conclusions we bring forward some suggestion for the next campaign.

Table 2: The scores of all participating systems
Table 3: Performance on verbs. Micro / macro average precisions are spitted by "/" at the last row.
